      • loadDatabase

        public static boolean loadDatabase()
        Deprecated. 
        Load database from file-system

        Must be called before any database reading events.
        Returns:
        Boolean

      • getETAdata

        public static org.json.JSONObject getETAdata(java.lang.String route,
                                             java.lang.String busStopCode,
                                             int lang,
                                             int bound,
                                             int stop_seq)
        Deprecated. 
        Get ETA data from KMB server. And save to memory for other functions.

        Must be called before any ETA reading events
        Parameters:
        route - The bus number / route name / bus name
        busStopCode - The bus-stop code
        lang - Language to be received. KmbApi.ENGLISH_LANG / KmbApi.CHINESE_LANG
        bound - Bus-Line Bound
        stop_seq - Bus-stop sequence
        Returns:
        JSONObject

      • getServerTime

        public static java.lang.String getServerTime()
        Deprecated. 
        Get KMB data feed server time. And save to memory for other functions

        Must be called before any arrival calculating events.
        e.g. 23:45:33
        Returns:
        String

      • getServerHour

        public static int getServerHour()
        Deprecated. 
        Divide server time to 3 parts (Hour, Min, Seconds)
        Get server time hours.

        Load the Server Time data first by using getServerTime() Or outdated time
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.

        Returns -1 if the server time is null
        Returns:
        Integer

      • getServerMin

        public static int getServerMin()
        Deprecated. 
        Divide server time to 3 parts (Hour, Min, Seconds)
        Get server time hour.

        Load the Server Time data first by using getServerTime() Or outdated time
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.

        Returns -1 if the server time is null
        Returns:

      • getServerSec

        public static int getServerSec()
        Deprecated. 
        Divide server time to 3 parts (Hour, Min, Seconds)
        Get server time seconds.

        Load the Server Time data first by using getServerTime() Or outdated time
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.

        Returns -1 if the server time is null
        Returns:
        Integer

      • getRemainingFormattedTime

        public static java.lang.String getRemainingFormattedTime()
        Deprecated. 
        Calculates and formats the remaining arrival time left.

        Load the ETA data first by using getETAdata() Or outdated data
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.
        Load the Server Time data first by using getServerTime() Or outdated time
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.

        Returns "INVAILD" if the arrival time is null or ETA data not
        accessible.
        Returns "Arrived" if the bus is arrived / arrivial time is equal
        to the server time.
        Returns:
        String

      • getRemainingMin

        public static int getRemainingMin()
        Deprecated. 
        Calculates the remaining arrival minutes left.

        Load the ETA data first by using getETAdata() Or outdated data
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.
        Load the Server Time data first by using getServerTime() Or outdated time
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.
        Returns:
        Integer

        Deprecated. 
        Returns whether the specified arrival time is a scheduled time.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of arrival times. See the KMB App for details.
        Returns:
        Boolean

        Deprecated.

      • getArrivalTime

        public static java.lang.String getArrivalTime(int i)
        Deprecated. 
        Get the specified Arrival Time of the ETA Data Loaded

        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.
        Load the Server Time data first by using getServerTime() Or outdated time
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.

        Returns null if the arrival time is null or ETA data not
        accessible
        Parameters:
        i - The index of arrival times. See the KMB App for details.
        Returns:
        String

      • getFormattedTimeDefined

        public static java.lang.String getFormattedTimeDefined()
        Deprecated. 
        Get a formatted arrival time of the ETA Data Loaded

        Load the ETA data first by using getETAdata() Or outdated data
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.
        Load the Server Time data first by using getServerTime() Or outdated time
        or java.lang.NullPointerException might happen.

        May returns a response with
        Data Error, STime Error, END, INVAILD
        Returns:
        String

      • getStopSeq

        public static int getStopSeq(java.lang.String route,
                             int boundno,
                             java.lang.String stopcode)
        Deprecated. 
        Get the bus-stop sequence of the route with the bus-stop code
        !!WARNING!! This only works if the external database is loaded.

        Returns -1 if the route or the bus-stop code do not exist.
        Parameters:
        route - The Bus-Stop Number/Name
        boundno - The bound of the route
        stopcode - The Bus-Stop code
        Returns:
        Integer

      • getStopBuses

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStopBuses(java.lang.String stopcode)
        Deprecated. 
        Get all the buses in List according the bus-stop code
        !!WARNING!! This only works if the external database is loaded.

        Returns a list with nothing if no buses match the bus-stop code
        Parameters:
        stopcode - The Bus-Stop code
        Returns:
        List

      • getBusArrayIndex

        public static int getBusArrayIndex(java.lang.String busno)
        Deprecated. 
        Get the array index of the bus number.
        If it does exist, returns the array index
        If it does not exist, returns -1
        Parameters:
        busno - The bus name to be requested
        Returns:
        Integer
